name: There's No Place Like Home (Unless Your Flatmates Are Home)
name_original: There's No Place Like Home (Unless Your Flatmates Are Home)
description:
Description

You’ve just come home from a long day at work. Hungover from the night before, you just want to go about your evening without bumping into any of your housemates. Complete all the objectives without any interruptions, a brush in with any of your 4 co-habitants will have dire consequences!
